website_summaries.verdict: Heavy-duty speed sled that will stand up to rough treatment and multiple kinds of workouts.
pros: Uses a high quality of steel in the frame so it will give you a high level of performance over time
Skid pads on the runners are replaceable once you notice wear on them
Gives you high, middle, and low sets of handles, so you can vary your workout
Also will work with a harness
cons: Weights must be placed toward the back, affecting sled's balance

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Awesome Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: Great sled and even more awesome customer service from the Rep Fitness team. My sled had a screw that was stripped upon initial delivery and I contacted them directly and they were able to send me a replacement foot and screw very quick. My wife and I have used the sled for conditioning a few times so far and we love the quality and workmanship of it. You can definitely tell it's built to last! If you're wondering what all you can do with this beast; just lookup prowler training and enjoy! You can make it a great total body workout
customer_reviews.author: Joe P.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great sled for the garage gym athlete and works well ...
customer_reviews.text: Given that this sled is ~$100 less than what you can find on Rogue or EliteFTS I was a bit skeptical of the quality, but it has exceeded my expectations. This is a great sled for the garage gym athlete and works well on both asphalt and grass. Great product and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Brad E Haller

customer_reviews.title: Know what you are getting yourself into
customer_reviews.text: This sled is HARD work on the pavement. That being said, it is a heavy duty, quality product that assembled very fast. The multi tool included is pretty much garbage, so I had to use my own socket wrench. Outside of that, I am exceptionally happy. The customer service for this company is great and answered all my questions within 24 hours. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Peters

customer_reviews.title: Great Training tool.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this purchase. Thank you Amazon for shipping this to Hawaii. The sled is heavy duty and does exactly what we need. I may add a coat of protective paint where the weights go just as a precaution because of sliding the weights on and off.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This sled is a killer workout. The sled its self has very good construction and the welds are high quality. Too me about 15 minutes to put together that included me finding my tools. It does require some open ended wrenches and socket set to put it together. I recommend this sled to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: lucius

customer_reviews.title: Great work out machine
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and he loves it...great work out for Fire Fighting exercises. Stored on my covered patio and within a month it started rusting❗❗❗❗still a great product though. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Haven't had a chance to use it yet but when assembled it feels stable and will be great for training at our home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ships to Hawaii
customer_reviews.text: product was damage-free, came with all the listed parts, easy assembly with the given instructions, and works well on grass.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Get you one!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Great value and very well made...I call mine the Black Widow..'cause the works outs are killer..
customer_reviews.author: mj868

customer_reviews.title: Great workout
customer_reviews.text: Love this sled. Very easy to put together and so far I haven't had any issues with it. My only complaint would be I would like the company to add a rope connector on the other side of the sled. Overall, worth every penny I spent on it.
customer_reviews.author: Black Belt319

customer_reviews.title: Well built with good straps
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the gymnasts that I coach to help with speed training. The sled is heavy enough by itself for the girls to use without weights.
customer_reviews.author: csmith

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality and great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: For the price my sled is extremely well built. When I received the order, it was missing the straps but a quick message to the seller rectified the problem immediately. Would recommend to anyone wanting to make themselves vomit during a workout. Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: J Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very strong and easy to set up. Have to use on concrete though, just doesn't slide on turf or grass very well. Just hoping the plates on the bottom survive.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Coffman

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Solidly constructed and heavy. Unfortunately, I can't push it on grass, unless your grass is as smooth as a putting green. Because of its weight it tends to dig in to the ground, so I have to push it on concrete or some other hard surface. So I'm a little concerned that the runners will wear out eventually. Other than that, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: michael k. lewis

customer_reviews.title: Tuff and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Good training aid, came as described . No cheap construction.
customer_reviews.author: ENRIQUE GARCIA

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great sled, well built and exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Allie B

customer_reviews.title: It work great on grass
customer_reviews.text: Slides great but started to rust on the third day but great for conditioning the legs
customer_reviews.author: Gary Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product!
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and strong product to handle all my athletes' needs!
customer_reviews.author: Rashad Lashley

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, shipping was on time and is just as described. I love this product
customer_reviews.author: Julio A. Baez Santiago

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice sled and seems to be well built
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sled and seems to be well built. I have two problems. The first is you can't put standard plates on the bars. The second is that there are no skid pads so it just scraps against steel.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Should have tested before building.
customer_reviews.text: I like the compact Maude of this prowler since the tall bars come out, but with al of the weight in the back, you cannot push it from the low/double bars. It will just flip over. Unless you reach through from the back, but if it is loaded up; that is difficult. Bad design flaw. Needs to be better balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Needham

customer_reviews.title: ... no plastic covering on the feet so it is pretty loud down our street
customer_reviews.text: Only down side is there is no plastic covering on the feet so it is pretty loud down our street. Otherwise heavy duty and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rep Power Sled--Superb Workout Addition
customer_reviews.text: Terrific Awesome workout. Not for the faint of heart! Great value for price.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty sled
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sled. My son uses it in the basement. It is compact but heavy and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: hockeymom1523

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great sled for pushing outdoors. Everything you need for a great workout!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Bowde n

customer_reviews.title: no complaints
customer_reviews.text: The best value I've seen in a sled. Used in a commercial setting no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

product_meta.title: REP FITNESS Weight Sleds for Conditioning, Cross Training, and Football - Power Sled and Adjustable Pull Sled with Optional Harness
feature_bullets: Heavy-duty commercial quality sled. Measures 35(W)x33(L)x23(H without poles inserted, 44" with) and 68 Lbs
Heavy duty 7 gauge and 11 gauge steel, our sled is beefier than the rest
Replaceable skid pads. If you use the sled on rough surfaces daily, you've got the ability to replace the skid pads once they wear out.
High/Low push handles and eyelets for attaching a rope or harness for dragging.
600 lb capacity and 5-yr warranty on the frame.
